entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 2:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Humidity: 44 %
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: ENE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow or ice pellets beginning overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
